title: "Nvidia’s founding couple donates $50M for AI computing at alma mater Oregon State University"
excerpt: "Huang, CEO of Nvidia, and Lori Huang donated $50 million to the school to build a new innovation complex on campus. The university has also raised a total of $100 million in gifts to launch what will ultimately be a $200 million research and education center with one of the nation’s most powerful supercomputers."
